name: Mystical Realms Collection
summary:
Mystical Realms collection includes:
- Sacra Terra 2: Kiss of Death
- House of 1000 Doors 3: Serpent Flame
- Stray Souls 2: Stolen Memories
- Mountain Trap: The Manor of Memories
- Saint: Abyss of Despair
- Chronicles of Emerland
- Curse of the Werewolves
- Veil of Mystery: Seven Little Gnomes
- Silent Scream: The Dancer
- Odysseus: Long Way Home
- Arizona Rose & the Pirates Riddles
- Oddly Enough Pied Piper
- Snark Busters: High Society
- Sacra Terra: Angelic Night
- The Treasures of Mystery Island 2: The Gates of Fate
- In Search of the Lost Temple
- Hide & Secret 1, 2, 3 & 4
